adjective.description: Not corporate; not united into a corporation. rare.
Not having a material body; incorporeal or bodiless.

verb.description: To deprive of corporate character; to dissolve (a corporate body).
To separate from a corporate body; to dissociate, disconnect.

origin: Late 15th century (in an earlier sense). From dis- + corporate<br>late 16th century. From dis- + corporate.
